about.title: We .push the limits
about.paragraph_1: We are a Turin based web development agency.
about.paragraph_2: We work side by side with UX and Creative agencies to build unique digital experiences for Brands, NGO, Museums and Institutions.
about.paragraph_3: We have 15+ years experience and we constantly keep up to date with emerging technologies and frameworks so we can advice on the most suitable STACK for each project.
about.paragraph_4: We are not the classic “one size fits all” agency, instead depending on project requirements and expectations we develop custom solutions based on solid technologies.
